DataElement.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A condition or state at a particular time._the CDUS status of a protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the CDUS status of a protocol.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Active - Trial is open to accrual

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Active - Trial is open to accrual
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Active - Trial is open to accrual

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Approved - Trial has official CTEP approval

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Approved - Trial has official CTEP approval
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Approved - Trial has official CTEP approval

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Temporarily Closed to Accrual & Treatment - Trial is temporarily not accruing and patients are not receiving therapy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Temporarily Closed to Accrual & Treatment - Trial is temporarily not accruing and patients are not receiving therapy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Temporarily Closed to Accrual & Treatment - Trial is temporarily not accruing and patients are not receiving therapy

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Closed to Accrual - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  Patients are still receiving therapy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Closed to Accrual - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  Patients are still receiving therapy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Closed to Accrual - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  Patients are still receiving therapy

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Temporarily Closed to Accrual - Trial is temporarily not accruing

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Temporarily Closed to Accrual - Trial is temporarily not accruing
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Temporarily Closed to Accrual - Trial is temporarily not accruing

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Closed to Accrual & Treatment - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  All patients have completed therapy, but patients are still being followed according to the primary objectives of the study

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Closed to Accrual & Treatment - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  All patients have completed therapy, but patients are still being followed according to the primary objectives of the study
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Closed to Accrual & Treatment - The protocol has been closed to patient accrual.  All patients have completed therapy, but patients are still being followed according to the primary objectives of the study

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Complete - The protocol has been closed to accrual, all patients have completed therapy and the study has met its primary objectives

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Complete - The protocol has been closed to accrual, all patients have completed therapy and the study has met its primary objectives
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Complete - The protocol has been closed to accrual, all patients have completed therapy and the study has met its primary objectives

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Administratively Complete - The protocol has been completed prematurely (e.g. due to poor accrual, insufficient drug supply, IND closure)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Administratively Complete - The protocol has been completed prematurely (e.g. due to poor accrual, insufficient drug supply, IND closure)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Administratively Complete - The protocol has been completed prematurely (e.g. due to poor accrual, insufficient drug supply, IND closure)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Status; a condition or state at a particular time.
